statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_metrics ORDER BY decision_making_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT leader_name, team_size FROM leadership_metrics WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT communication_score, decision_making_score FROM leadership_metrics WHERE team_size < 10;
SELECT * FROM leadership_metrics WHERE leader_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT AVG(communication_score), AVG(productivity_score) FROM leadership_metrics;
SELECT * FROM leadership_metrics WHERE communication_score > 4 AND decision_making_score < 3
SELECT leader_name, team_size, productivity_score FROM leadership_metrics WHERE team_size > 10 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC
SELECT COUNT(id), AVG(communication_score) AS avg_communication_score FROM leadership_metrics GROUP BY leader_name
SELECT leader_name, SUM(productivity_score) AS total_productivity_score FROM leadership_metrics GROUP BY leader_name HAVING total_productivity_score > 20
SELECT leader_name, SUM(productivity_score) + SUM(decision_making_score) AS total_score FROM leadership_metrics WHERE team_size BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY total_score ASC
SELECT * FROM LeadershipMetrics
SELECT leader_name, metric_type, metric_value FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT id, leader_name FROM LeadershipFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT metric_type FROM LeadershipMetrics
SELECT * FROM LeadershipFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE metric_type = 'KPI' ORDER BY metric_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT leader_name, metric_type, metric_value FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE metric_type LIKE '%quarterly%' ORDER BY leader_name ASC
SELECT leader_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM LeadershipMetrics GROUP BY leader_name ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT leader_name, feedback_description, feedback_date FROM LeadershipFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT leader_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback_count FROM LeadershipFeedback GROUP BY leader_name HAVING total_feedback_count > 3 ORDER BY total_feedback_count DESC, leader_name ASC
SELECT * FROM LeadershipEffectivenessMetrics
SELECT employee_id, leadership_rating, communication_rating FROM LeadershipEffectivenessMetrics ORDER BY leadership_rating DESC
SELECT review_id, review_comment FROM PerformanceReviewComments WHERE reviewer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT * FROM TeamEngagementScores WHERE engagement_score > 80
SELECT team_id, engagement_score FROM TeamEngagementScores
SELECT * FROM LeadershipEffectivenessMetrics WHERE leadership_rating > 3 AND motivation_rating < 5
SELECT employee_id, communication_rating FROM LeadershipEffectivenessMetrics WHERE leadership_rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviewComments WHERE reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM TeamEngagementScores WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90
SELECT review_comment FROM PerformanceReviewComments WHERE employee_id = '98765432-1010-1112-1314'
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT id, leader_name, performance_score FROM performance_metrics WHERE leadership_style = 'Autocratic';
SELECT team_name, team_performance_score FROM team_metrics WHERE team_communication_rating >= 4 ORDER BY team_performance_score DESC;
SELECT leader_name, SUM(communication_skills) AS total_communication_skills FROM leadership_skills GROUP BY leader_name;
SELECT id, reviewer_name, timestamp FROM feedback_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE performance_score >= 80;
SELECT leader_name, leadership_style FROM performance_metrics WHERE team_size > 10 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, MAX(team_size) AS max_team_size FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM feedback_metrics WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 4 AND 5 AND reviewer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT team_name, team_performance_score FROM team_metrics WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipMetrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT leader_id, feedback_text FROM LeadershipFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT score_id, score_type, score_value FROM LeadershipScores WHERE score_value < 50 ORDER BY score_date ASC;
SELECT rating_category, AVG(rating_score) AS average_score FROM LeadershipRatings GROUP BY rating_category;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY metric_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM LeadershipMetrics WHERE leader_id = 3 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM LeadershipFeedback WHERE leader_id = 1 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT score_type, score_value FROM LeadershipScores ORDER BY score_value DESC, score_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT rating_category, rating_score FROM LeadershipRatings WHERE rating_score >= 4 ORDER BY rating_date DESC, rating_category ASC;
